name: Global Time View (p1)
description: An advanced timezone tool that displays live-updating digital time across all timezones. Features include a searchable and filterable list, pinning for important timezones (Local, GMT, Pacific), and a timestamp converter. Users can paste a timestamp in various formats to see it converted across all timezones simultaneously. Each entry includes the UTC offset, a copy-to-clipboard button for the live time, and corresponding IANA timezone names.
